name: 小哈里·萨顿
name_full: 小哈里·萨顿 Harry Sutton Jr.
introduction: Harry Sutton Jr. is an Actor, DJ and Bartender. After several years of studying at HB Studios, he performed in a number of Off Broadway productions, most notably John Guare's Six Degrees of Separation in which he played Paul. Over his years of acting experience, Harry grew as an accomplished and versatile actor, with bookings in voice overs, commercials, industrials, daytime, prime time, film, theater and print. As of recent, Harry has been studying under the legendary Anthony Abeson to which he credits Mr. Abeson for resetting him as an Actor. Through Mr.Abeson's teachings, Harry has discovered and applied new methods and tools to hone his craft.Harry's strong work ethic combined with his passion and knowledge for the arts continues to bring him success in his creative ventures and acting career.
